Document.Focus: Headache - what to ask your doctor

Synonyms.Synonym: What to ask your doctor about headaches
Migraine - what to ask your doctor
Tension-type headache - what to ask your doctor
Cluster headache - what to ask your doctor

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Headache - what to ask your doctor ?
QAPair.Answer: A headache is pain or discomfort in your head, scalp, or neck. Below are questions you may want to ask your health care provider about your headaches.
